Articles.Content:
Hello!

Recently I watched a video and saw in 0.21 you're going to update the entire space center! Which is awesome! But there was something that I've always wanted and that was a taxiway for the runway

In the update 0.21 the tower looks really close to the runway, I couldn't tell how far on the video I watched, but it looks like it will pose a threat to my aircraft I design, like this guy!

Large aircraft are not the only benefit from having a taxiway, in fact it is the least of my concern

Having a taxiway with a small parking area will not only give the Space Center a new great and more realistic look while moving the flight tower away from the runway, but also will give you a place to go and park your aircraft after your flight, which will be a great feeling especially after a re-entry and perfect touchdown on the runway, or a perfect flight with your newly designed prototype aircraft.

Also, having a parking area will allow you to save certain aircraft instead of terminating them when they are left on the runway, allowing you to save your favorite aircraft off to the side whether it be for show, or for a mission.

Here are some examples of a taxiway

I think this would be a great addition into the game and I really hope this does get added into the game, because I hate to say it but I spend 99% of my time designing aircraft and flying them rather than rockets into space

Thank you, and I really hope you support this

Edited July 29, 2013 by Nebula

If they can make the wheels (not the rover wheels) turn (or if they make a new kind of aircraft wheels that allows the craft to be turned), then this should follow.
